entry.title: Friday night: A few clouds. Low minus 15.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Fog patches developing overnight. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light overnight. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 18 this evening and minus 23 overnight. Forecast issued 11:20 PM CST Friday 20 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Mainly sunny. High minus 8.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud near noon. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 8. Wind chill minus 23 in the morning and minus 13 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:20 PM CST Friday 20 January 2023
